PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-13262019-09-06,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  FIN
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectMontreal Port Authority's borrowing limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder approving the provisions of the supplementary letters patent for the purpose of increasing the limit on the power of the MONTREAL PORT AUTHORITY to borrow money on its credit for port purposes in order to allow it to further develop its strategic infrastructure and to bring its borrowing limit to a level on par with its current financial capacity.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
